PARTNERS_PART_1_TITLE: Give your brand the spotlight it deserves
PARTNERS_PART_1_TEXT: We treat every page on our website like a beautiful window display. Our production quality and user experience are held to the highest standard
PARTNERS_PART_2_TITLE: Move your inventory in a flash
PARTNERS_PART_2_TEXT: Most sale events on Leflair sell out in hours. Let us help you clear stock and instantly free up capital so you can bring in new collections
PARTNERS_PART_3_TEXT: Vietnam’s population is rapidly growing and so is its spending power! Millions of buyers were until now frustrated by the lack of offering and are seeking quality branded goods
PARTNERS_PART_4_TEXT: The reach of an offline stores is by essence limited. Work with Leflair and reach potential customers in every single city of Vietnam
PARTNERS_PART_5_TEXT: Send us an email, we'll get back to you right away
PARTNERS_PART_6_TITLE: The hard work is on us
PARTNERS_PART_6_TEXT: We do the heavy lifting and take care of all the operations, the storage of your products, the photo and content production and even the delivery to happy customers
GG_SECTION_1_TITLE: Authentic products from the world’s best brands
GG_SECTION_1_TEXT: Our mission is to make the world’s most desirable brands accessible to Vietnamese consumers. While we always offer the best prices, we never compromise on quality: We carefully inspect every single item for quality and authenticity before delivering them to you.
GG_SECTION_1_TEXT_2: Here is how we do it:
GG_SECTION_2_TITLE: 1. We only work with official and authorized partners
GG_SECTION_2_TEXT: The merchandise sold on Leflair is always purchased from the brands directly or, if the brand does not have a representative office in Vietnam, from their official distributors. We only select partners who have the proper certifications to distribute the brands we acquire.
GG_SECTION_2_TEXT_1: If our partner is the brand, they provide us with certified copy of their brands registration certificate provided by the office of intellectual property
GG_SECTION_2_TEXT_2: If our partner is an authorized distributor, we require a certified copy of their authorization certificate of distribution provided by the brand owner
GG_SECTION_4_TEXT: All products available for sale come with certified documentation from our partners. We ensure our goods have been legally purchased, declared to the government, and authorized to be sold to our customers. We require a valid purchase invoice from our partners for all products sold on Leflair. We provide a valid invoice in every single parcel shipped to our customers
GG_SECTION_5_TEXT: Our product Quality Control team inspects every single item twice to ensure that the product is in perfect condition:
GG_SECTION_5_TEXT_1: First, upon receiving the merchandise from our partners in order to identify any possible flaw very early on and replace the product
GG_SECTION_5_TEXT_2: As we prepare your parcel before shipping it to you, to ensure the quality remained perfect during the storage period
GG_SECTION_7_TITLE: How to Check the Authenticity of Our Products
ABOUT_US_TEXT_1: Every idea starts with a problem, and ours was clear: branded goods in Vietnam are simply too expensive for most people. Vietnamese shoppers have to go abroad to "hunt" for their favourite brands. Others place orders from international websites, accept high shipping fees and have to wait for months for their items to arrive.
ABOUT_US_TEXT_2: Why the hassle? Vietnamese consumers deserve better.
ABOUT_US_TEXT_3: We created Leflair to give you a better alternative. We believe that shopping is a pleasure, not a chore. Brands should come to you at your convenience, and at attractive prices.
ABOUT_US_TEXT_4: Leflair is the first website in Vietnam to provide  the world’s best brands, at a fraction of the retail price. Every morning, and for a very limited time, we open new boutiques filled with an inspiring selection in women’s & men’s fashion, beauty, home, kids and much more.
ABOUT_US_TEXT_5: Since we only source directly from brands and official distributors, you are guaranteed total product authenticity, quality and best prices!
ABOUT_US_TEXT_6: Leflair aspires to become the No.1 online destination for brand shopping in Vietnam. Our bigger ambition is to make branded goods more accessible to the entire Southeast Asia.
CAREER_HEADLING: We are always looking for friendly, talented people to join our team
CAREER_TITLE_1: 1. Your career can only go as far as the company you are working for.
CAREER_TEXT_1: That means that you should work for a company that is capable of extraordinary growth and can constantly offer new opportunities
CAREER_TITLE_2: 2. If you work with brilliant people, you will live brilliantly.
CAREER_TEXT_2: Building a vibrant workplace where employees are pulling each others up is at the core of our culture.
CAREER_TITLE_3: 3. You should work on things that matter.
CAREER_TEXT_3: Not only you will participate in building an amazing company from the ground up, you will accomplish a lot of important work that make a lasting difference in people’s lives
SEND_EMAIL_TO: Or send us an email to
